analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noāsavo dhammo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham āsavam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no āsavaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham āsavam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: noāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham āsavam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho noāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ no āsavaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ no āsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanoāsavo dhammo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham noāsavam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na noāsavaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham no āsavam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na no āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham no āsavam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanoāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na noāsavaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na noāsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti
hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
